live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.
Technicians continue to wait for the BC Hydro to complete their repairs. Once power is back online our technicians will resume restoring services.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
42331.summary: Some customers in the Renfrew Heights/Cascade Heights area of Burnaby are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42331.title: Sept 27 - Vancouver (Burnaby (Renfrew Heights/Cascade Heights)) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected areas.
Technicians continue to wait for the local power company to complete their repairs. Once power is back online our technicians will resume restoring services.
Hydro continues to work to restore power. Thank you for your patience.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
42296.summary: Customers in Barlmertown and Red Lake are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42296.title: Sept 26 – Balmertown, Red Lake | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
